document_data.mainbody:
Tharundar was a Red Wizard of Thay in the late 14 century DR.
He was thin, sharp-looking, and had a long beard.
Fellow Red Wizard Harnrim Starangh answered directly to him. Tharundar actively encouraged Harnrim calling on his wisdom, and told him it was a good thing.
Harnrim considered Tharundar his superior in wisdom and power.
After the War Wizards raided the Rightful Conspiracys meeting in Marsember in the early spring of the , Tharundar was consulted by Harnrim Starangh prior to a meeting with the Lady Joysil Ambrur of the same city, inquiring about any intelligence collected on that woman.
